title: Binary Koala
extract: The word Koala means “No Water”. It can also mean lack of water, water deficiency, and even it can mean a dry drought as well. Koala word is very common in Australia because Australia is the driest continent on Earth.
extract_html: The word Koala means “No Water”. It can also mean lack of water, water deficiency, and even it can mean a dry drought as well. Koala word is very common in Australia because Australia is the driest continent on Earth.
